title: REAL #1
description: I came in with chronic neck and shoulder pain and felt real relief after a few sessions. Dr. Dan is thoughtful, gentle, and explains every step.

title: REAL #2
description: Acupuncture helped my stress and sleep more than I expected. I now sleep through the night and feel much more balanced during the day.

title: FAKE #1
description: Mobile visits made care easy for my schedule. The virtual consult was clear, the treatment plan was practical, and my sinus congestion improved.

title: FAKE #2
description: I started weekly sessions for insomnia and anxiety. After a few weeks I felt calmer, slept better, and had more steady daytime energy.

title: FAKE #3
description: We added acupuncture during our fertility journey and appreciated the thoughtful guidance. The process felt supportive and personalized.
